Title: Mvvm Foundation Silverlight
Description:
Mvvm Foundation Silverlight is a library of classes that are helpful when building Silverlight applications based in the MVVM pattern.

This library is based on the WPF only MVVM Foundation, with a Silverlight library add-on.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Mvvm Foundation Silverlight is a library of classes that are helpful when building Silverlight applications based in the MVVM pattern.

This library is based on the WPF only MVVM Foundation, with a Silverlight library add-on.

The source code contains the original MVVM foundation WPF library, a Silverlight library and 2 sample project: one WPF sample and one Silverlight sample.
To download the latest version, go to the "Source code" tab.

For more information about MVVM Foundation, please visit http://mvvmfoundation.codeplex.com/.
